meanings.definition: Engaged in illegal activities for profit.
meanings.sent1: The racketier gang was caught by the police.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood was wary of the racketier activities happening in the abandoned building.
meanings.sent3: The racketier tried to sell fake watches, but they all ticked backwards!
meanings.sent4: The city streets whispered tales of the racketier underworld lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The racketier's flashy lifestyle was a facade for their criminal deeds.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in illegal activities for profit.
meanings.sent1: The racketier was known for their shady dealings in the city.
meanings.sent2: The police were on the lookout for the notorious racketier in the area.
meanings.sent3: The racketier always wore a mysterious mask to hide their true identity.
meanings.sent4: In the world of crime, the racketier was a master of deception.
meanings.sent5: The racketier's arrest sent shockwaves through the criminal underworld.
